name: es2015
description: _Feb 7th, 2017_ # setting up Bable to convert our js to es2015. 1. Create project folder. 2. NPM init Creates package.json. 3. git init and ignore node_modules. 4. NPM install 3 dependancy bable, preset and gulp. 5. Add bablerc file with presents "presets": ["es2015"]. 6. include gulp task. 7. create out source file. 8. run gulp to test.
